dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4757 IH: Fully Informed District Bank Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Pittenger introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to modify the appointment process for presidents of Federal Reserve Banks.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fully Informed District Bank Act.

section.header: Amendment to appointment of presidents of Federal Reserve Banks
section.text: The fifth subparagraph of the fourth undesignated paragraph of section 4 of the Federal Reserve Act (12 U.S.C. 341) is amended by striking Class B and Class C directors and inserting board of directors.
